mapper.insert: insert into cus_center(cus_b_num, userid, subject, content) values(cus_b_num_sq.nextval, #{userid}, #{subject}, #{content} )
mapper.select: select cus_b_num, userid, subject, to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate from cus_center order by cus_b_num desc
select cus_b_num, userid, subject, content, to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate from cus_center where cus_b_num = #{cus_b_num}

select count(cus_b_num) totalRecord from cus_center
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select * from (select * from (select cus_b_num, subject, userid, to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate from cus_center
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by cus_b_num desc )
where rownum<=${onePageRecord*nowPage} order by cus_b_num asc
)
where rownum<=${onePageRecord} order by cus_b_num desc
where rownum<=${lastPageRecord} order by cus_b_num desc
